stories.text:
To access Spanish government services, I need to install a root certificate.

What are the security implications if any?

"To use your DNIe in your browser you need:

- Install the PKCS#11 Security Module

- Install the Root Certificate of the DNIe Certification Authority"

More info: https://www.dnielectronico.es/PortalDNIe/
stories.title: Ask HN: Safe to Install Government Root Certificate?

stories.text:
One-on-one, because it's simpler:

- When one stops talking, the other starts.

- No groups, no hierarchy, no status.

Voicechat, because it's more intimate then text and more private then video.

With other HN readers, because that creates some common ground.
stories.title: Show HN: Coffeehouse, one-on-one voicechat with random HN users
